metadata.name: May I say a few words?
metadata.description:
Poetry isn’t dead. You’ll have to kill me. 

A collection of 23 paintings painted over the course of a two year span. I matched these paintings to a song I produced and recorded in Logic Pro using midi devices, a microphone, and a plethora of samples found from various corners of the internet. 

This project is an accumulation of my greatest works in all three categories of music, painting, and poetry. 

I really hope you enjoy :) 

Thank you. 

-petewater
